TAUNT.szText: It was all part of my plan!
I've had enough!
Oh my God!
They ain't paying us enough for this shit...
When did things go so wrong?
I'll be back! With friends!
You'll pay for that... the other day!
You're not playing fair!
Don't think I will forgive ya!
Mommy!
I'll be back when you least expect me, fucker!
TAUNT.szTextCensored: I'll be back when you least expect me, punk!

TAUNT.szText: I'll leave you alive... for now.
Enough is enough!
Screw this! I'm outta here!
Screw this! I'm not even a real soldier!
Tactical retreat!
I've seen enough.
Nope, nope, nope.
Run to the hills!
Let's call it a draw.
They said "join the army". Not for this shit!
I regret nothing!
Game over, man!
Let's be friends!
Party's over!
Violence is not an answer!
I'm too beautiful to die!
Screw you guys, I'm going home!
Make love, not war!
I, ehrm, left the lights on in my place. Gotta go!
Leave me your phone number, and I'll get back to ya!
I can't deal with this anymore!
I'm getting the hell out of here!
I will not fight those bastards alone!
I am outta here.
The army... I should have known better!
Coming here... What was I even thinking?
I'm surrounded by idiots! I'm out!
No weapons! No friends! No hope!
I never wanted to join the army! My mom forced me to!
Wait till my brother hears about this, he's gonna kick your ass!
Sometimes the road less travelled is less travelled for a reason!
OK, that was the last straw!
You're cheating!
It's time to consider retirement...
Don't think it's over! I'll hunt you down wherever you go!
Why can't we all just get along?
